meanings.definition: To express oneself in a poetic manner.
meanings.sent1: She poetised her thoughts in a journal filled with lyrical prose.
meanings.sent2: The author poetised the struggles of the characters in the novel.
meanings.sent3: He poetised his dreams in a whimsical poem about flying pigs.
meanings.sent4: Her gestures poetised the story even without words.
